p: This compound is an epimer of cadina-1(10),4-dien-8α-ol isolated by Weyerstahl et al. [ 19] from the essential oil of Iranian Pulicaria gnaphalodes (Vent.) Boiss. Differences in chemical shifts of both isomers agree with the axial/equatorial stereochemistry of the hydroxyl group, particularly the shielding of C6 due to the γ steric effect of the hydroxyl group.
